name: not wild ball
description:
- you can't win, but you can't lose either

- short but endless, play as much as you want

- spirit of the eighties in every kilobyte

- without sound, so you can enjoy the game during your lunch break without disturbing your colleagues

- you literally feel like a ball

- without boring menus, you can start playing right away

- intuitive controls and hints

- play in full screen for the ultimate experience!
